Statistics moduleÂ¶

The stats module contains functions to perform data filtering and exploratory data analysis.

The following submodules are currently implemented:

  • The genesd module contains functions to detect outliers in a data array.

  • The window module contains functions to filter a data array.

  • The cluster module contains functions to perform clustering.

  • The pca module contains classes and functions to perform principal component analysis.
